Actualmente necesita comprar quesos, crema, leche, queso fresco y requesón, para surtir el negocio, pues ella los compra ya elaborados, esta inversión será D. mucha ayuda para Patricia.
El objetivo D. ella es recibir el apoyo D. financiamientos, para poderse desarrollar en el negocio, tratando siempre D. mantener un buen record.
texts.en:
Patricia lives with her husband and 10-year-old daughter.  She sells dairy products.  She started this business 15 years ago.  Since then she’s strengthened it offering the best in cheese, curd and all other milk derivatives.  This business has helped her meet her household needs.

She currently needs to buy cheese, cream, milk, fresh cheese and cottage cheese to stock the business because she buys them already make.  This investment will be of much help for Patricia.

Her goal is to receive financial support to develop in business always striving to maintain a good record.

loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, milk, fresh cheese and cottage cheese.

loans.name: Subira Group

texts.en:
Kisinguru, who is in his late 30s, is married with three children who go to school. He has been running a grocery business for 4 years now.  He works from 8 a.m to 8 p.m daily and is able to a fair monthly profit.

This will be his 6th Motisha loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  A Motisha loan is a product offered by Tujijenge Tanzania,  given in the middle of the main loan that motivates borrowers with good credit ratings who pay back their  loans  smoothly to receive half the amount of the existing loan before their original loan term has ended. He used his previous loans to increase the range of items from the grocery, for household expenses and also started building his house. He has paid back his loans successfully. He hopes to increase the grocery store inventory.  His dream is to one day be able to finish his house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Subira" which has a total of 9 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: To increase his grocery store inventory.

loans.name: Celso

texts.es:
El señor Celso tiene 53 años de edad, está casado con la señora Ramona, tienen 3 hijos juntos, dos ya mayores de edad.  
El Señor es muy emprendedor, y trabajador, compra productos tales como sabanas, sobrecamas, colchas, hamacas y otros y se encarga de venderlos a cuotas en la localidad de Coronel Oviedo en donde viaja cada semana a buscar clientes y cobrar sus productos recorriendo casa por casa. En su negocio recibe la ayuda de su esposa, ya que ella elabora hamacas y que luego el lo vende junto a sus otros productos.
Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo pudo brindarles a sus hijos todas las comodidades y a la vez hacerle estudiar, además de eso, dos de sus hijos lo ayudan en sus ventas.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas y frazadas, para la posterior venta ya que tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes y quiere cumplir con ellos. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
Celso, 53, is married to Ramona.  They have three children together; two of them are already adults.

He is very enterprising and hardworking.  He buys products like sheets, bedspreads, comforters, hammocks and others and then resells them in installments in the town of Coronel Oviedo where he travels to weekly in search of customers and to collect payment for his products door to door.  His wife helps him with the business since she makes hammocks that he then sells along with his other products.

Thanks to his work and effort he was able to provide his children with all comforts as well as an education.  In addition, two of his children also help him with sales.

He requests the loan to buy sheets and blankets for subsequent resale since he has many pending orders from customers and he wants to fulfill them.  He thanks the Fundación for the opportunity it provides him.

loans.use: to buy sheets and blankets for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Celsa Julia

texts.es:
Celsa es madre soltera y desde hace varios ella tiene su propio negocio y con el ha podido sostener a su hijo, ella se siente muy feliz con negocio y quiere que cada día crezca mas, además ella se sueña que su hijo mas adelante sea quien administre el negocio.

Ella necesita comprar mas insumos y productos para que su negocios tenga variedad para sus clientes y así pueda continuar creciendo y mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su hijo.
texts.en:
Celsa is a single mother and  for several years has been running her own business which has made her able to support her son.  She is very happy with her business and wants it to grow.  Also, she is hopeful that someday in the future her son will be running this business.

She needs to buy more supplies and merchandise to give her customers more variety and this way be able to continue growing and improving her quality of life and that of her son.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Jose Eduardo

texts.es:
José tiene 43 años es soltero y tiene dos hijos, vive con su familia en San Gabriel. Se describe como una persona trabajadora y emprendedora.

Se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura. Trabaja con Fodemi por un tiempo de 5 años y el crédito que solicita actualmente es para la compra de terneros para incrementar su negocio lo cual le ayudaría a mejorar su situación económica y su calidad de vida.

Su sueño es tener un negocio estable y darles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jose is 43 years old, single and has two children.  He lives with his family in San Gabriel.  He is know as a hard working and enterprising person.

He works with cattle and agriculture.  He has been working with Fodemi for 5 years and the currently requested loan is for the purchase of land to increase his business.  This will help him to improve his financial situation and his quality of life.

His dream is to have a stable business and to provide for his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase land for his breeding.

loans.name: Melita

texts.es: Melita tiene 41 años, es madre soltera de un hijo de 13 años, quien depende de ella para tener educación y alimentación, por ello se esfuerza día a día para darle lo mejor. Juntos viven en su casa propia en compañía de sus hermanos y de su papá. Su trabajo consiste en ofrecer el servicio de transporte de pasajeros, y su faena empieza desde muy temprano para salir en busca de los pasajeros, quienes son comerciantes, trabajadores que necesitan ir a sus centros de trabajo. Es así como recorre las diversas calles de su ciudad, y cuyas ganancias le han permitido dar educación a su hijo. Por otro lado, posee otro negocio que es la venta de lubricantes, aceites y demás productos para vehículos, y del que su padre la ayuda poniendose a cargo de dicho negocio. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, porque tiene tiempo para su hogar y administrar ambos negocios. Este será el séptimo crédito con  MFP y esta contenta de trabajar con su grupo comunal, porque le dieron la oportunidad de invertir y ver crecer su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, podrá refaccionar su establecimiento y comprar más productos como lubricantes y aceites, asimismo llevar al mecánico su mototaxi.
texts.en: Melita is 41 years old and a single mother of 13 year old son who depends on her for education and food. For this reason she she puts forth each day to give him the best. Together they live in their own house along with her siblings and her father. She works in a passenger transportation service, and her day begins very early as she goes out looking for passengers who are merchants and workers that need to get to their jobs. So she drives the many streets of her city, and those profits have enabled her to educate her son. Also, she has another business selling lubricants, oils, and other car products, and her father helps her by putting her in charge of that business. She very much enjoys what she does because she has time for her home and for running both businesses. This will be her seventh loan with MFP, and she is happy to work with her communal back because they give her the opportunity to invest in and grow her business. With the loaned amount, she will able to renovate her establishment and buy more products like lubricants and oil as well as take her moto-taxi to the mechanic.

loans.use: to buy more lubricants and oils, refurbish her establishment, and repair her moto-taxi.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, vive con sus dos hijos D. 17 y 20 años, hace ocho años se dedica a vender ropa como: blusas, vestidos, camisas para niños, damas y caballeros, trabaja todos los días D. lunes a domingo.
Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar más mercadería: blusas, camisas, vestidos, debido que hay mucha demanda y necesita tener variedad para tener más clientes, y aumentar en sus ingresos.
El sueño D. Maria que sus hijos sigan estudiando en la universidad, y poder darles lo necesario para que vivan bien.
texts.en:
María lives with her two children who are 17 and 20 years old.  She’s been selling clothes like blouses, dresses and shirts for children, women and men for the last 8 years.  She works every day from Monday through Sunday.

She needs the loan to buy more merchandise: blouses, shirts, dresses because demand is high and she needs to have variety to have more customers and increase income.

María’s dream is that her children continue going to the university and to be able to give them everything they need to live better.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell.

loans.name: Cosme

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Cosme; el tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el tiene un auto el cual brinda el servicio de taxi y apoya a su conyugue en el negocio de venta de leche; el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de leche y negocio de transporte.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar llantas para su carro y para comprar leche al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The lender belongs to the communal bank "SAN BARTOLOME DE TAMBO REAL.” The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is in the Cusco province and the department of Cusco. 

The lender is Cosme. He is 36 years old, in a common law marriage, and he has two children. The lender alternates his daily activities with his transportation business. He has a taxi with which he provides taxi services, and he also has a business selling milk. The lender is raising his children through this business. The lender wishes to grow his taxi business and his business selling milk. The lender is asking for a loan in order to maintain his car and to buy milk in bulk.  

The lender is happy about the loan and he promises to comply with the terms of the agreement.

loans.use: to maintain his car and to buy milk in bulk

loans.name: Jaime Raul

texts.es:
Jaime Raúl tiene 41 años de edad es soltero vive con la familia y con el hijo de cuatro años de edad en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Descripción de la Ventanilla  VRC Luchar para triunfar, se encuentra ubicada en el sector la poza, perteneciente a la ciudadela 10 de noviembre  Cantón Ventanas, Los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a diferentes labores tanto Agrícola como comercial.

Jaime se dedica a la  agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, cacao, los productos los compra en Comercial Lola. Solicita el crédito para  comprar abonos, fertilizantes, urea e incrementar la siembra y comprar más  semillas.
El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar los abonos para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentemente son la competencia y las plagas.

El sueño de Jaime es poder apoyar a la familia económicamente para la medicina y alimentación y poderse comprar un carro para transportar los productos para poder venderlos.

 En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con la familia al campo.
texts.en:
Jaime Raúl is 41 years old, is single, and lives with his family and his four year old son in the Ventanas Province of Los Rios. 

The communal bank VRC fights to get ahead. It is located in the "poza" area, which is in the neighborhood "10 de noviembre" in the Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank work in various businesses both agricultural and commercial. Jaime works in agriculture planting corn, rice, and cacao, and he buys products in the Lola Commercial Center. He is asking for a loan to buy manure, fertilizers, urea and to increase planting and to buy more seeds. 

This loan will be a great help in being able to buy fertilizers to keep his crops in good condition. The challenges he most often faces are competition and pests. Jaime's dream is to be able to help his family financially with medicine and food and to be able to buy himself a car to transport his products and be able to sell them. 

In his free time he likes to take leisure trips with his family in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, and urea, and to increase planting, and to buy more seeds.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, vive en casa de su madre con su hija de 1 año y su hermano, desde hace tres años se dedica a vender ropa para todas las edades: para niños, damas y caballeros como: short, pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas todos los días vende en el mercado y más que todo el día domingo es  el día que más se vende.
Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar  mercadería y tener más variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes, y comprar  blusas, pantalones, faldas, vestidos de esa forma obtener más ingresos para ayudar a su familia y tener  posibilidades de incrementar más su negocio.
texts.en:
María lives in her mother’s house with her brother and her one-year old daughter.  She’s been selling clothing for all ages for the last three years.  She sells clothes for children, women and men like: shorts, pants, shirts, blouses and skirts.  She sells every day at the market but mostly on Sundays which is the day that sales are best.

She needs the loan to buy merchandise to have more variety available for her customers and to buy blouses, pants, skirts and dresses to earn more income to help her family and have the possibility of increasing her business more.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Victor Alfredo

texts.es:
Víctor Alfredo tiene 26 años de edad es soltera, no tiene hijos  vive con los padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Descripción de la Ventanilla  VRC Luchar para triunfar, se encuentra ubicada en el sector la poza, perteneciente a la ciudadela 10 de noviembre  Cantón Ventanas, Los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a diferentes labores tanto Agrícola como comercial.

Víctor se dedica a la  agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, cacao, los productos la compra en Comercial Lola. Solicita el crédito para  la compra de semillas, insumos, abonos, fertilizantes, urea  y poder incrementar la siembra.

El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar los abonos  para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentemente son la competencia y las plagas.
El sueño es poder apoyar a los padres económicamente para la alimentación y comprarse una casa para poder vivir tranquilos.
En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte en especial el indor.
texts.en:
Víctor Alfredo is 26 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with his parents in the Ventanas canton, province of Los Rios.

The Luchar Para Triunfar communal bank is located in the La Poza area, which belongs to the 10 de Noviembre neighborhood in the Ventanas canton. The members of this bank are involved in agricultural and commercial work.  

Víctor works in agriculture. He plants corn, rice, and cacao. He buys his materials in the Comercial Lola. He is asking for the loan to buy seeds, materials, fertilizer, urea and to increase his plantings.  

The loan will be very helpful to buy the fertilizer to keep his crop in good condition. 

The challenges he faces are the competition and pests. His dream is to support his parents financially and to buy a house son they can live there. In his free time, he likes to play sports, especially indoor soccer.

loans.use: to buy seeds, materials, fertilizer, and urea as well as to increase his plantings.

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es:
El joven Carlos Humberto tiene 23 años de edad, vive en la aldea Nagarejo del municipio de Agua Fría, Carlos esta soltero y no tiene hijos. Carlos se dedica al negocio de carnicería desde hace 1 año y medio, ahi vende todo tipo de carne de res, cerdo, chorizo y pollos, sus principales clientes son las personas que visitan el mercado y sus amigos.
Carlos utilizara el credito para la compra de carne de cerdo, carne de res, pollo y chorizos.
Su meta es lograr expandir su negocio y su sueño es llegar a formar una bonita familia.
texts.en:
Carlos Humberto is a young man who is 23 years of age. He lives in the neighborhood of Nagerejo in the town of Agua Fría. Carlos is single and has no children. He has been in the meat business for 1½ years and sells all types of meat such as beef, pork, chorizo, and chicken. His main customers are the people who visit the market and his friends.

Carlos will use this loan to buy pork, beef, chicken, and chorizo. His goal is to expand his business, but his dream is to start a beautiful family.

loans.use: to buy pork, beef, chicken, and chorizo.

loans.name: Jadir Elena

texts.es:
La señora Jadir divorciada de su esposo queda sola a cargo de su hijo desde hace ya varios años y es por esto que decide poner su propio negocio donde vende bisutería y decoración, todo esto que vende es hecho por ella misma.

Ella se sueña con tener un local con variedad de sus productos y además que tengan una marca propia  y pueda ser reconocida en el medio, para esto ella necesita comprar insumos para elaborar la bisutería y así tener mayor variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Sra. Jadir is divorced from her husband and has been raising her son alone for several years. For this reason, she decided to establish her own business selling trinkets and decorations. She does everything by herself.

Jadir dreams of having a store with a variety of products, but she would also like to have her own brand so that she can be recognized in the media. For this reason, she needs to buy supplies for making trinkets in order to have a wider variety of products.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for making trinkets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cell phones, chargers and cases.

loans.name: Christian Israel

texts.es:
Christian Israel tiene 24 años de edad es soltero vive con la familia y con el hijo de dos años de edad en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Descripción de la Ventanilla  VRC Luchar para triunfar, se encuentra ubicada en el sector la poza, perteneciente a la ciudadela 10 de noviembre  Cantón Ventanas, Los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a diferentes labores tanto Agrícola como comercial.

Christian se dedica a la  agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, cacao, los productos las  compras y las ventas lo realiza en ventanas. Solicita el crédito para  la compra de semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, urea  y poder incrementar la siembra.
El crédito le será de mucha ayuda para poder comprar los abonos  para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentemente son la competencia y las plagas.

El sueño de Christian es poder apoyar a la familia económicamente para la alimentación y poderse comprar un carro para transportar los productos para poder venderlos. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte en especial el indor.
texts.en:
Christian Israel is 24 years old, single, and lives with his family and his two-year-old son in Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Luchar Para Triunfar” (Fight to Win) is located in the La Poza section of the town called “10 de Noviembre” (November 10th) in the canton of Ventanas.  The members of this Communal Bank engage in various businesses ranging from agriculture to retail.  

Christian is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and cacao.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, and urea so that he can increase his output.

This loan will be a great help since he can buy the compost for maintaining good conditions for his crops.  The challenges he faces on a frequent basis are the competition and pests.  Christian dreams of supporting his family financially by providing food and purchasing a car for transporting and selling his products.  

In his free time Christian enjoys practicing sports, especially indoor soccer.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, and urea.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina tiene 62 años y es socia del Banco Comunal "Nuestra Señora D. la Paz“ del distrito Tarapoto en el departamento D. San Martín. Es viuda y tiene 6 hijos (3 son mujeres), todos ya son independiente. 

Lleva 10 años trabajando con Manuela Ramos.  Inició su negicio D. venta D. pollos pero lamentablemente lo tuvo que dejar por haber estado enferma. Ahora se dedica a la venta D. productos cosméticos, esta actividad la realiza por las tardes y además ha tenido la idea D. construir algunas habitaciones en su casa para darlos en alquiler. Un joven le ayuda con el negocio. 
Su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 3,000.00 lo invertirá en la construcción D. nuevas habitaciones.

Marina desea seguir trabajando para incrementar su ganancias y construir más habitaciones para alquilar.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la facilidad que dan para pagar y los bajos intereses.
texts.en:
Marina is 62 years old and a member of the Communal Bank “Nuestra Señora D. La Paz” (Our Lady of the Peace) which is in the District of Tarapoto, Department of San Martín. She is a widow and has six children (including three daughters). All of them are independent.

Marina has worked with Manuela Ramos for 10 years. She started her business by selling chickens but unfortunately she had to quit because of illness. Now she sells cosmetics since it is an activity that she can work at in the afternoons. In addition, she came up with the idea to build a few rooms in her house that she could make available for rent. A young man helps her with the business.

Her new loan of 3000 PEN will be invested in the construction of new rooms. Marina wants to continue working so that she can increase her earnings and build more rooms for rent. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the payment terms and the low interest rates.

loans.use: to build four rental rooms in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of seafood: fish, shrimp and crabs.

loans.name: Santos Bernardino

texts.es:
El señor Santos Bernardino es casado, tiene 39 años de edad, estudió  la educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos 2 de los cuales estudian, se dedica a la carpintería a la fabricación de todo tipo de muebles, iniciando este negocio como operario y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a la confección de tejidos.

Solicita un crédito que lo utilizara para ampliar su capital de trabajo en la compra de madera para la fabricación de telares, espera alcanzar su objetivo y mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Sr. Santos Bernardino is 39 years old, married, and has an elementary school education. He has three children, two of whom are in school. Santos is a carpenter who makes all types of furniture. He started this business as an operator, but now he has five years of experience. Santos has the support of his wife, who makes hand-woven articles.

He is requesting a loan to use to increase his operating capital so that he can buy wood for making looms. Santos hopes to accomplish his goal and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Flor Elisa

texts.es:
Flor Elisa es socia del Banco Comunal "Mujeres Valerosas II“ del distrito Tarapoto del departamento San Martín y tiene 24 años. Vive en la casa de su madre junto a su pareja y su hijo de 6 años. 

La idea de ser independiente le ha gustado desde siempre y ya desde niña le gustaba vender, vendía platanos en la calle. Inició su negocio con S/. 100.00 y desde hace 4 años tiene su propia bodega, cuenta con clientela fija y la frecuentan muchos transeúntes de la zona, como su local se encuentra en el camino de unas chacras que estàn cerca de su casa tiene mucha demanda. 
Su sueño es ser mayorista, así que piensa construir una nueva casa. 
El nuevo prestamo de S/. 3,000.00 lo invertirá en la compra de  nuevos productos para su bodega, comprará productos de primeta necesidad.

Le agradece a Manuela Ramos el apoyo y dice que le gusta los plazos cortos.  También le gustado mucho el módulo educativo, sobre todo lo referente a la atención al cliente.
texts.en:
Flor Elisa is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Valerosas II” (Valiant Women II) which is located in the District of Tarapoto, Department of San Martín. She is 24 years old and lives at her mother’s house with her partner and their six-year-old son.

Flor has always liked the idea of being independent. As a young girl, she enjoyed selling bananas on the street. Flor started her own store four years ago with 100 PEN. She has an established customer base and many pedestrians who pass through the area since her shop is located along the road in front of some farms near her home. There is great demand for her business. Her dream is to become a wholesaler so she plans to build a new house.

This new loan of 3000 PEN will be invested in the purchase of new products for her store, such as basic necessities. Flor is grateful for the support Manuela Ramos has provided and says that she likes the short repayment terms. She also enjoys the educational classes, especially the ones that focus on customer service.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Carlos Horacio

texts.es:
Carlos desde hace 20 años trabaja vendiendo mercancía por las calles, el con su negocio a logrado sacar a su familia adelante y además poder brindarles cada día una mejor calidad de vida.

El trabaja desde muy temprano en la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, el recorre las calles ofreciendo sus productos. El quiere comprar mas mercancía para tener mas variedad para ofrecerle a sus clientes, además así se incrementas sus ventas y su economía mejora notablemente.
texts.en:
Carlos has been selling merchandise on the streets for 20 years. His business allows him to move his family forward and provide them a better of quality of life each day.

He works very early in the morning until 8pm. Carlos travels through the streets offering his products. He wants to buy more merchandise so that he can have more variety to offer to his customers. In addition, he hopes to increase his sales and improve his finances considerably.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a compressor and crates of automotive tools.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
Lucy tiene 36 años y es socia del Banco Comunal "Las Moralinas“ del distrito Morales en el departamento San Martìn. Tiene dos hijas de 15 y 6 años de edad. 

Se dedica a la producción de pasteles que proporciona a su clientela haciendo uso de un motokar. Ademàs tiene una bodega que opera todo el dìa. Desde hace siete años forma parte de Manuela Ramos, iniciando su negocio con un préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00. Su padre le apoyò en establecerlos. 
Con el nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 va a comprar insumos para la preparación de pasteles (harina, azúcar, huevos, etc) y espera un dìa poder tener un verdadero coche para el reparto.

Siente que estàn unidas en su Banco Comunal, le gusta mucho el compartir con las socias y agradece a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo a las mujeres más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Lucy is 36 years old and a member of the Communal Bank “Las Moralinas” which is located in the District of Morales in the Department of San Martín. She has two daughters, ages 15 and 6.

Lucy makes pastries and delivers them to her customers by using a motorcar. In addition, she has a store that she operates the entire day. She joined Manuela Ramos six years ago and used her first loan of 300 PEN to start her business. Her father helped her with establishing her business.

With this new loan of 3000 PEN, Lucy will buy supplies for preparing pastries (flour, sugar, eggs, and other ingredients). She hopes to one day own a true car for making her deliveries.

Lucy feels like she is part of her Communal Bank. She enjoys sharing with the other members and appreciates Manuela Ramos for the support it provides to women who are most in need.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, eggs, and other ingredients for making pastries.

loans.name: José Orlando

texts.es:
A sus 24 años de edad José es un emprendedor que desde muy pequeño le ha apasionado la labor en el campo, y es por tal motivo que hoy se siente orgulloso de su trabajo, se dedica con esmero a la comercialización de leche ya que actualmente tiene 4 vacas de las que diariamente puede sacar producción. 

Sueña con sacar a sus 2 hijos adelante, brindarles un mejor futuro, y darles la oportunidad de estudiar. Y aunque su esposa actualmente no trabaja el se preocupa por que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida, sin embargo quiere hacer unas adecuaciones locativas y no cuenta con el capital para hacerlo por lo que solicita un préstamo con el cual organizar el establo para las vacas, mejorar los pastos y adecuar las instalaciones donde hoy en día funciona su negocio. 

En un futuro quiere tener mas vacas que le permitan mayor producción, de esta manera tanto las ventas como sus ingresos se incrementarán notablemente.
texts.en:
José is a 24-year-old entrepreneur who has been passionate about working in the fields since he was very young. For this reason, he is very proud of his work. With dedication, José has been selling milk. He currently has four cows that produce milk on a daily basis.

José dreams of helping his two children move forward, providing them a better future, and giving them the opportunity to study. His wife currently does not work. José is concerned that his family have a better quality of life. Nonetheless he wants to make a few infrastructure improvements, but he does not have the capital to do the work. For this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can renovate the stable for his cows, improve his pastures, and remodel the facilities where he currently operates his business.

In the future, he wants to have more cows so that he can have increased production. This will help his sales and his income to increase significantly.

loans.use: to renovate the stable for his cows.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, vende lotería al por mayor, el cual lo reparte a sus clientes desde hace tres años, él vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas, todos los días sale a repartir los billetes de loteria de lunes a domingo.
El necesita el préstamo para aumentar en sus ganancias y tener clientes y comprar más billetes de lotería por mayor, y con el tiempo trabajar propio.
El sueño de juan es crecer en su negocio mejorar en sus ingresos darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan sells lottery tickets wholesale, which he has distributed to his customers for three years.  He lives with his wife and two daughters.  Every day, Monday through Sunday, he goes out to distribute lottery tickets.

He needs the loan to increase his profits and have customers and buy more lottery tickets wholesale, and in time work for himself.

Juan's dream is to grow in his business, improve his earnings, and give a better life to his family.

loans.use: to buy lottery tickets wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.es:
El joven Jose Félix tiene 27 años de edad, vive en el Barrio Abajo de la ciudad de Nacaome, Jose esta casado con Yenni Xiomara y aun no tienen hijos, estan en planes de tenerlos.
El señor José Félix se dedica a la venta de mercaderia, su negocio esta ubicado en la terminal de buses del Amatillo, ahi vende todo tipo de productos para uso personal y tambien peliculas y cds grabados con musica.
Félix utilizara el credito en la compra de mercadería para su negocio, desea surtirlo ya que las exigencias de sus clientes son mayores.
Su principal sueño es construir una casa, para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y a sus hijos que vendran en un futuro.
texts.en:
Sr. José Félix is a young man who is 27 years of age. He lives in the neighborhood of Abajo in the city of Nacaome. Jose is married to Yenni Xiomara and they have no children, but they plan to have them.

Sr. José Félix sells merchandise from his business which is located at the bus terminal in Amatillo. He sells all types of personal use products, as well as movies and music CDs. Félix will use this loan to buy merchandise for his business. He plans to restock according to the demands of his older customers.

His main wish is to build a house so that he can provide a better quality of life for his wife and any children they may have in the future.

loans.use: to purchase lotions, crèmes, talcum powders,  gels, nail polishes, earrings, lip pencils, hair clips, movie DVDs, and music CDs.

loans.name: Carlos Andres

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 32 años tiene 3 hijos vive con su mamá en San Gabriel, se describe como una persona tranquila, luchadora y le gusta siempre salir adelante.

Carlos trabaja en la compra venta de ganado. Es el tercer crédito que le solicita a Fodemi el mismo que será utilizado para la compra de terneros para su crianza y venta, lo cual mejoraría su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Su sueño es tener un terreno propio para poder criar a sus terneros.
texts.en:
Carlos, 32, has three children and lives with his mother in San Gabriel.  He describes himself as a quiet person and a fighter who always likes to get ahead.

Carlos buys and sells cattle.  This is the third loan that he himself has requested from FODEMI.  He will use it to buy calves to raise and sell, which would improve his quality of life and that of his family.

His dream is to have his own piece of land to be able to raise his calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
La señora Juliana es socia del banco comunal Nuevo Horizonte del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 59 años D. edad y cuatro hijos, solo uno está a su cargo.
Lleva 10 años trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta D. aguaje (fruta regional) crudo y también en masa, cuenta con la ayuda D. su hijo que es el que moviliza los sacos D. aguaje, porque son muy pesados para que ella los cargue.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 5 sacos D. aguaje, 4 paquetes D. bolsa, 2 sacos D. carbón, y 10 costales para trasladar la fruta.
Para este negocio no necesita D. más cosas que una olla granD. y 3 tinas grandes para calentar el aguaje, éste es un fruto muy agradable y es consumido bastante en la ciudad ya sea en refresco a en fruto cocinado.

Debido a que el esposo D. Juliana es agricultor, no cuenta con un sueldo fijo y hay gastos que él no pueD. cubrir, como buena esposa la señora juliana emprendió el negocio propio que le dio muchas satisfacciones como haber sacado adelante a su familia.  Agradece a Manuela Ramos por toda la ayuda  recibida tanto por los préstamos como con las orientaciones que brindan las promotoras.
texts.en:
Señora Juliana is a member of the "Nuevo Horizonte" ("New Horizon") communal bank, which is in the District of Calleria, and Department of Ucayali.  She is 59 years old and has four children, only one of whom lives at home.

She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for ten years.  She works selling aguaje (a regional fruit), both raw and also baked in dough.  She has the assistance of her son, who takes care of moving the sacks of aguaje as they are to heavy for her to carry.

With her new loan of 3,000 New Soles, she will buy: 5 bags of aguaje, 4 packets of bags, 2 sacks of coal, and 10 sacks for transporting the fruit.  She doesn't need anything else for her business, other than one large pot and 3 large vats for heating the aguaje.  It is a very pleasant fruit which is consumed a lot in the city as a refreshment or as cooked fruit.

As Juliana's husband is a farmer, he doesn't have a fixed salary and they had expenses that they could not cover.  Señora Juliana, as a good wife, learned her own business.  It gives her great satisfaction as she has been able to move her family ahead in life.

She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for all the support she has received; as much with the loans as with the orientations that the counselors proviD..

loans.use: to buy 5 sacks of aguaje (a regional fruit), 4 packets of bags, 2 sacks of charcoal, and 10 sacks for transporting the fruit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, beans, cheese and pork crackling for her store and pupusa business.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila tiene 70 años y es una socia muy responsable y alegre del Banco Comunal "Nuestra Señora de la Paz“. Es soltera y tiene 4 hijos (una hija adoptada) todos independientes. Vive sola, pero tiene el pleno apoyo de su hija que vive en Tarapoto.

Toda su vida Zoila ha trabajado de manera independiente, como cuenta. Tiene un pequeño puesto en un mercado de Tarapoto donde vende cada dia (hasta mediodia) sus verduras, café y especias. 
Desde hace cuatro años forma parte de Manuela Ramos y está feliz por esta oportunidad de recibir un préstamo. Su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 lo invertirá en la compra de productos para su negocio, comprará verduras y especias al por mayor.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando y ahorrar màs para tener una buena jubilación. Nos cuenta que en Manuela Ramos  ha encontrado amigas y que disfruta en las reuniones.
texts.en:
Zoila, 70, is a very responsible and happy member of the Nuestra Señora de la Paz communal bank.  She is single and has four children (one adopted daughter) on their own.  She lives alone, but she has the full support of her daughter who lives in Tarapoto.

Zoila has worked independently her whole life, as she tells it.  She has a little stall in a market in Tarapoto where she sells her vegetables, coffee, and spices every day until noon.

For four years she has been part of the Manuela Ramos organization and she is happy about this opportunity to receive a loan.  With her current loan of 2,500 PEN she will buy products for her business, vegetables and spices wholesale.

Her dream is to continue working and save more to be able to have a good retirement.  She tells us that she has made friends in Manuela Ramos and that she enjoys the meetings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and spices.

loans.name: Lesbia Damaris

texts.es:
La señora Lesbia Damaris vive en el Barrio Abajo de la ciudad de Nacaome, esta casada con el señor Enrique  el cual en estos momentos vive en Estados Unidos, han procreado tres hijos.
La señora Lesbia se dedica a la venta de comida en su comedor desde hace aproximadamente un año y medio.
Lesbia vende desayunos, almuerzos, tacos, pupusas, emparedados, refrescos, agua y café, sus principales clientes son las personas que visitan el mercado de Nacaome.
Doña Lesbia utilizara el credito para la compra de alimentos para preparar sus deliciosas comidas. las ganancias las utilizara para el sustento de sus hijos.
Su principal sueño es Construir una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Lesbia Damaris lives in the Barrio Abajo neighborhood of Nacaome.  She is married to Enrique, who lives in the United States at the moment, and they have three children.
Lesbia has sold food from the dining room of her home for about a year and a half.  She sells breakfast and lunch; tacos, pupusas, sandwiches, soft drinks, water, and coffee.  Her main customers are people who go to the market in Nacaome.
Lesbia will use the loan to buy ingredients to make her delicious foods.  She will use the earnings to support her children.
Her main dream is to build a better house.

loans.use: buy ham, eggs, beans, cheese, butter, chicken, tortillas, beef, rice, lard, oil, spices, potatoes, cassava, cabbages, lemons, and cornmeal.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.es: Milagros tiene 41 años, se destaca por ser una mujer valiente, luchadora y muy responsable, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos de 22, 21, 18 y 15 años quienes aún viven con ella en su casa que es propia, inmueble que logró comprarlo con mucho sacrificio. Hoy lo que más prioriza es ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Su trabajo consiste en la venta bolsas, negocio que lo hace de manera ambulante, es así que su labor empieza desde muy temprano en el mercado de Bellavista, recorriendo los pasillos en busca de clientes así como algunas calles que son muy transitadas. Ella es muy querida, pues es carismática y sabe llegar a sus clientes, y eso ha hehco que dure en éste trabajo alrededor de ocho años y por lo que seguirá continuando para que pueda apoyar a sus hijos en su educación. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo libre para cuidar su hogar y cuidar de sus hijos, sin embargo manifiesta que se cansa mucho el tener que recorrer las calles, pero sabe que vale la pena, si desea ver a sus hijos profesionales. Espera para el futuro tener un local pequeño y evitar tener que estar caminando. Este será el cuarto crédito con MFP, manifiesta sentirse bien con su grupo por que son responsable y muy unidos, asimismo asegura cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mas bolsas para que pueda seguir con su trabajo y por ende tener ingresos en su hogar.
texts.en:
Milagros, 41, stands out for being a fine and very responsible woman and a fighter.  She is a single mother of four children, ages 22, 21, 18, and 15, who still live with her in her home, which she managed to buy with great sacrifice.  Currently her biggest priority is to give her children a better quality of life.

Her work consists of selling bags, which she does on foot, so she begins working very early in the Bellavista market, going through the passageways and some busy streets in search of customers.  She is well liked, since she is charismatic and knows how to reach her customers.  This has allowed her to last about eight years in this job, and she will go on with it so she can support her children in their education.

What she likes about her job is that she has free time to be able to take care of her home and her children.  Nevertheless, she says that she gets tired having to walk the streets, but she know that it's worth it if she wants to see her children become professionals.

Milagros hopes to have a small place in the future so she can avoid having to be walking.  This will be her fourth loan with MFP.  She says she feels good about her group because they are responsible and very united.  She also guarantees that she will fulfill her loan payments.  She will buy more bags with the amount requested so she can continue with her work and consequently have income in her home.

loans.use: to buy more bags.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es:
A sus 36 años de edad, Mariluz es una emprendedora consagrada a su negocio, una tienda donde vende todo tipo de tarjetas, peluches, chocolates y detalles para todo tipo de ocasión. El oficio lo aprendió hace muchos años, pues se ha dedicado a vender en almacenes y afirma que las ventas son una pasión para ella por lo que hace 1 año decidió emprender un nuevo negocio.

Mariluz es una luchadora incansable que espera tener mas clientes y mas posibilidades económicas para tener su negocio surtidos y con gran variedad. Esta emprendedora considera que su trabajo es una bendición, ya que en un futuro su almacén puede ser una legado para sus 2 hijos

Actualmente Mariluz necesita de un préstamo para comprar mercancía y así incrementar su capacidad de comercialización mejorando proporcionalmente sus ventas.
texts.en:
At 36 years of age, Mariluz is an entrepreneur who is dedicated to her business, a store where she sells all sorts of cards, plush toys, chocolates, and small items for any type of occasion. She learned this trade many years ago, since she had been selling in stores. She says that sales are a passion for her and for that reason one year ago she decided to start a new business.  

Mariluz is a tireless worker who hopes to have more clients and more economic possibilities to have her store stocked with a great variety of items. This entrepreneur considers her work to be a blessing because in the future her store can be a legacy to her two children. 

Currently Mariluz needs a loan to buy merchandise so that she can increase her commercial capability proportionally increasing her sales.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to supply her business.

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es:
José, vive con sus padres, es soltero, se dedica a la agricultura: maíz y frijoles trabaja con su padre, todos los días, no tiene un horario establecido.
El necesita el préstamo para comprar herbicidas para las plagas, abono y sobre todo semilla para sembrar y de esa forma obtener más ingresos para venderlo y dejar para su familia.
El sueño de José es hacer su propia casa, comprar un terreno y sembrar café y tener una mejor estabilidad económica para él y su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his parents and is unmarried.  He works in agriculture, growing corn and beans.  He works with his father on a daily basis, with no fixed work schedule.

He needs the loan to purchase herbicides to treat infestations, manure, and above all seeds for planting and in this way he will earn more income by selling his crops and be able to provide for his family.

José's dream is to build his own home, to buy some farmland and grow coffee, and to have better financial stability for himself and for his family.

loans.use: to purchase herbicides to treat infestations, manure, and above all seeds.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es:
Rosalia tiene 53 años y es socia del Banco Comunal "Nuestra Señora de la Paz“ del distrito Tarapoto del departamento San Martín. Tiene dos hijos mayores que viven fuera de casa y una hija de 12 años que vive con ella.

Rosalia es una de las primeras socias del Banco Comunal, lleva ya 12 años con Manuela Ramos.
Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, visita a sus clientes en sus casas para sacar pedidos. Tiene además un puesto donde exhibe sus productos, además aprovecha para vender bebidas y de vez en cuando comida.  
El nuevo préstamo de S/.3,000.00 lo invertirá en la compra de nuevos productos cósmeticos como perfume y nuevas bebidas.

Lo que le gusta con Manuela Ramos es que ha aprendido a ahorrar y cómo generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
Rosalia is 53 years old and is a member of the communal bank “Nuestra Señora de la Paz” (Our Lady of Peace) in the district of Tarapoto in the department of San Martín. She has two grown children who live on their own and a 12 year old daughter who lives with her. 

Rosalia is one of the first members of the communal bank, already having 12 years with Manuela Ramos. She sells beauty products through a catalogue, and she visits clients in their homes to take orders. She also has a stall where she shows her products, and she also takes the opportunity to sell drinks and, from time to time, food. 

She will invest the new loan of S/.3,000.00 in the purchase of new cosmetic products like perfume and new drinks. What she likes about Manuela Ramos is that she has learned to save and how to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetics in general and drinks

loans.name: Doris Liliana

texts.es:
Doris desde hace 2 años decidió poner un negocio de venta de mercancía para ayudarle a su esposo con las obligaciones del hogar. El negocio se encuentra ubicado en la tienda de su madre y desde allí ofrece sus productos.

Actualmente Doris necesita comprar mercancía para surtir su negocio, comprar mas variedad de blusas, jeans,y vestuario en general, igualmente quiere aumentar la cantidad en el surtido, así sus ventas se incrementaran y proporcionalmente sus ingresos, pero ella no cuenta con el ese capital de inversión por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita comenzar a cumplir sus metas y paso a paso llegar a cumplir su mayor sueño, tener un espacio propio donde tener su negocio, un almacén que logre reconocimiento en el mercado y que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Two years ago Doris decided to open a business selling merchandise to help her husband with the household obligations.  The business is located in her mother's store, and from there she offers her products.

Currently Doris needs to purchase merchandise to stock her store, to purchase a wider variety of blouses, jeans, and clothes in general. She also wants to increase the quantity she has in stock so her sales increase and, proportionally, her income. She doesn't count on this investment capital which is why she is asking for the loan that will help her to begin to accomplish her goals and step by step complete her biggest dream - to have her own space where she has her business and a store that people will recognize in the market that will permit her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, jeans, and clothes in general

loans.name: Roci Raquel

texts.es:
La señora Roci es socia D. banco comunal Siete Estrellas D. Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 42 años D. edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
Se dedica a la venta D. mercaderías como ropas, balsos, carteras, zapatos, en estos momentos no cuenta con mercaderías porque todo lo ha colocado entre sus clientes y espera que pase la huelga que hay en la zona para poder ir a traer más mercadería a la ciudad D. lima.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/ 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 6 carteras, 10 pares D. zapato, 5 bolsos, 12 polos para hombres.
Este nuevo préstamo le va servir para completar el capital necesario para traer más mercadería, su esposo es trabajador independiente y comparten los gastos.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos ahora tiene independencia económica.
texts.en: Roci is a member of Siete Estrellas (Six Stars) community bank in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali, Peru. She is 42 years old, married and has a son. She makes a living selling products like clothing, handbags, wallets and shoes. At this time she doesn't have any supplies because everything has been claimed by her customers, and she hopes that the strike in her area passes so she will be able to bring in more products from the city of Lima. With this loan, Roci plans to purchase six wallets, 10 pairs of shoes, five handbags and 12 men's polos. This loan will give her the necessary capital to bring in more merchandise. Her husband is self-employed, and they share the household expenses. Thanks to Kiva partner Manuela Ramos now Roci has economic independence.

loans.use: to purchase six wallets, 10 pairs of shoes, five handbags and 12 men's polos.

loans.name: Marlene Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marlene, tiene negocio de pupusas en su casa, por las tardes sábado y domingo desde hace dos años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 7 y 10 años de edad.
Ella necesita el crédito para incrementar su negocio y para comprar materia prima como: quesillo, maíz para la masa, chicharrón, y de esa forma incrementar sus ganancias y darle una mejor atención a sus clientes. 
La aspiración de Marlene es aumentar en sus ganancias, crecer en su negocio y que su familia tenga lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en:
Marlene has a business in her home making pupusas (stuffed tortillas).  She works Saturday and Sunday evenings, and has been doing this for two years.  She lives with her husband and two children aged 7 and 10 years old.

She needs the loan to grow her business and to purchase raw ingredients such as cheese, corn for the dough, and pork crackling.  In this way she will increase her earnings and provide better service for her customers.

Marlene's aspiration is to increase her earnings and grow her business, and that her family will have everything it needs to live.

loans.use: to buy cheese, corn, and pork crackling for making her pupusas (stuffed tortillas).

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 40 años y es socia del Banco Comunal "Tesoro Escondido“.  Es conviviente y su pareja tiene su propio negocio.  Tiene dos hijos de 19 y 21 años que ya no dependen de ellos. 

Desde hace cinco años Sonia mantiene su bodega. Empezó con S./ 300.00. Su negocio se ha establecido muy bien desde entonces y hoy es independiente y tiene sus propios ingresos, está muy contenta. 
Con el nuevo préstamo de S./ 3,000 comprará arroz, bebidas y otros abarrotes. Su sueño es ser mayorista y así mejorar sus ganancias.

Lo que le gusta mucho de Manuela Ramos son las reuniones mensuales con su Banco Comunal donde ha encontrado amigas. Para Sonia estas reuniones son momentos de relajo y distracción.
texts.en: Sonia is 40 years old and a member of "Tesoro Escondido" ("Hidden Treasure") Community Bank. She is married, and her husband has his own business. They have two children, ages 19 and 21, who live on their own. For the past five years, Sonia has had a convenience store, which she started with 300 soles. Her business has become well-established since then and today she runs it on her own and earns her own income, so she is very content. With this loan, Sonia plans to purchase rice, drinks and other grocery items. Her dream is to be a wholesaler and increase her profits. What she really likes about Kiva partner Manuela Ramos are the monthly meetings with her community bank, where she has made friends. For Sonia, the meetings are times of relaxation and distraction.

loans.use: to purchase groceries.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos, tiene la edad 38 de años, está casado y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa. El pretende con el crédito comprar herramientas para su taller mecánico. El cuenta con un local y la experiencia necesaria para seguir adelante con el proyecto, por lo cual el quiere comprar mas herramienta para así darle a sus clientes una mejor atención. El con la compra de esta herramienta perfeccionara sus trabajos y podrá ofrecerle a sus clientes mejores resultados con mayor calidad. El quiere con esto generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y propio. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos, 38, is married and lives with his two children and his wife.

With the loan he wants to buy tools for his mechanic shop.  He has a place and the experience necessary to get ahead with the project, for which he wants to buy more tools to be able to give his customers better service.  With the purchase of these tools he will perfect his work and be able to offer his customers better and higher quality results.  With this he wants to generate the greatest quantity of profits for his and his family's well-being.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  Previously, he had not had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy shop tools.

loans.name: Laura Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Laura Francisca es casada, tiene 41 años de edad, cursó solamente un años de estudios, se dedica a la lavandería de ropa, lleva tres años realizando este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es conserje de una institución.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para pagar los estudios de sus hijos, ya que espera que tengan un buen futuro, preparándolos a través del estudio.
texts.en:
Laura Francisca is married, is 41 years old, and only went to school for a few years. She washes clothes for a living, and has been doing so for three years. Her husband, who is a caretaker at an institution, helps her.

She is requesting a loan to be able to pay for her children’s education, since she hopes that they will have a good future and is preparing them through education.

loans.use: To pay for her children's education.

loans.name: Segunda Josefa

texts.es:
La señora Segunda tiene 65 años y es socia del Banco Comunal "Tesoro Escondido“. Su esposo es auxiliar D. contabilidad.  Tienen tres hijos, todos independientes.

DesD. hace 10 años que tiene su negocio, el que inició con un préstamo inicial D. S./ 300.00, ella se dedica a la venta D. golosinas y bebidas en la entrada D. su casa y además cría y venD. gallinas. También tiene una chacra dónD. cosecha café y cacao. 
Su sueños es construir encima D. esta chacra una casa D. campo y un parque infantil, para mostrar a los visitantes la flora bonita D. la región. 
Una parte D. su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 3,000.00 va a invertir en la chacra y con la otra parta va a comprar nuevos productos para su negocio en casa.
Josefa, como la llaman, ya lleva muchos años con Manuela Ramos y le agradece mucho su apoyo. Ahora es presidente en su Banco Comunal, función que le gusta cumplir por la importancia del cargo.
texts.en:
Segunda is 65 years old and a member of the Tesoro Escondido [Hidden Treasure] Community Bank. Her husband is an accounting assistant. They have three children who are all independent.

She has run her business for ten years, which she started with an initial loan of 300 PEN [$110]. She sells sweets and drinks from the entryway of her house, and also raises and sells chickens. She also owns a small farm where she harvests coffee and cocoa.
Her dream is to build a country house and a playground on her small farm, and be able to share the beautiful flora of the region with visitors.
She will invest part of her new 3000 PEN [$1100] loan in her farm, and will use the rest to purchase new products for her home business.
Josefa, as she is called, has worked for years with Manuela Ramos, and is very grateful for her help and support. Now she is the president of her Community Bank, which is a position she is happy to fill due to the importance of its responsibilities.

loans.use: to invest in her small farm and to purchase cookies and other sweets.

loans.name: Marcia Maritza

texts.es:
Marcia Maritza tiene 30 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo vive con la mamá, hermana y con el hijo de cinco años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC 1º de mayo, se encuentra ubicada en la cdla 1º de mayo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos se dedican a labores comerciales.

Marcia vende joyas de belleza desde hace un año atraz.Las compras de las joyas las hace en Guayaquil y su distribución es en el Cantón Ventanas.El crédito lo solicita para comprar mercaderia y aumentar, mejorar los ingresos económicos.

El sueño es tener y administrar un negocio que sea propio como socia mayoritaria.Los desafios al que se enfrenta a diario es la competencia.
En los momentos libres le gusta pasear con el hijo o visitar a la familia.
texts.en:
Marcia Maritza is thirty years old, single, and has one child. She lives with her mother, her sister, and her five year old son in the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province.

The members of the Primero de mayo Communal Bank, located in the Primero de mayo neighborhood of the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province, are devoted to commercial enterprises.

Marcia has been selling jewelry for the past year. She purchases jewelry in Guayaquil and distributes it in the Ventanas canton. She is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise and increase and improve her revenue.

Her dream is to have and to run her own business as a majority partner. The daily challenges she faces are her competition. In her free time, she likes to take walks with her son or visit with her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and increase revenue.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dressing table.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es:
La señora Susan es socia del banco comunal Siete Estrellas, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
Lleva dos años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas, actividad que realiza en un local lejos de su casa y lo atiende en horas de la noche, durante el día se dedica al cuidado de su hija y al arreglo de su hogar porque no tiene a nadie que le ayude con los trabajos domésticos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,200.00 comprará: 10 cajas de cerveza, 5 cajas de gaseosa, 2 paquetes de agua mineral.
Con este negocio se ayuda con los gastos del hogar y no permite que su esposo sea el único que aporte en la casa, sus ingresos no son mucho pero son muy significativos para su familia.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos por darle la oportunidad de seguir trabajando.
En la foto se muestra junto a su hijo
texts.en: Susan is a member of the Seven Stars communal bank, in the Calleria district in Ucayali. She is 29 and is married and has one child. She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos (Kiva field partner) for two years. She sells drinks in a place outside of her home and works in the evening. During the day she takes care of her daughter and her home because she doesn't have anyone to help with housework. With this new loan she will buy ten cases of beer, five cases of soft drinks, and two packages of mineral water. This business helps her with household expenses and doesn't allow her husband to be the only one to support the household. Her earnings are not much but they are very significant to her family. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her the opportunity to continue working. The photo shows her together with her daughter.

loans.use: to buy 10 cases of beer, 5 cases of soft drinks, and 2 packages of mineral water.

loans.name: Mardoqueo

texts.es:
El señor Mardoqueo vive en la aldea del Cerro de Marcovia, con el vive su esposa y su hijo, quienes tambien lo apoyan en su actividad, Mardoqueo es una persona trabajadora y muy dedicado a su negocio que es la venta de ropa nueva y zapatos.
sus clientes son los vecinos de su aldea y otros lugares como Monjares, Cedeño y Guapinol, Mardoqueo trabaja muy fuerte para sacar adelante a su familia y asi darles una mejor calidad de vida.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia, desea tener mas variedad de ropa ya que las ventas han estado buenas y se esta quedando con poca ropa.
texts.en: Mardoqueo lives in the village of Cerro de Marvocia with his wife and son, who also support him with his work. Mardoqueo is a hard worker and very dedicated to his business which sells new clothing and shoes. His customers are residents of his village and other places such as Monjares, Cedeño, and Guapinol. Mardoqueo works hard to care for his family and give them a higher quality of life. The loan will be used to purchase merchandise as he wants to have more variety in the clothing that he sells so that sales will be good and that he is leftover with very little merchandise.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, and shoes.

loans.name: Elkin Arcesio

texts.es:
Elkin es un luchador incansable, trabaja diariamente para hacer crecer su microempresa y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida, este negocio le ha permitido mejorar sus ingresos y aunque como él mismo lo afirma no son muchas las ganancias por lo menos tiene la tranquilidad de contar con los recursos para cubrir sus necesidades básicas. 

Elkin fue durante muchos años guarda de seguridad y la liquidación de este trabajo le permitió abrir una tienda - salsamentaria donde también vende productos de panadería, trabaja diariamente de 6:30 a.m. a 8:00 p.m con la ilusión de tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Actualmente Elkin requiere hacerle mantenimiento al horno de panadería pero no cuenta con el dinero para hacerlo, por tal motivo solicita un crédito con el cual hacer los arreglos necesarios y poder seguir con la producción de panadería, y proporcionalmente generando mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Elkin is a tireless, hardworking man. His goal every day is to make his small business grow so that he can improve his quality of life. His business has allowed him to increase his income, and although, as Elkin himself says, his earnings aren't great, at least he has the peace of mind that he can afford basic necessities. 

For many years Elkin worked as a security guard, and with his settlement when this job ended, he was able to open a store/delicatessan where he also sells baked items. He works daily from 6:30 am to 8:00 pm, always with the hope of having a better standard of living.

Now Elkin needs to make repairs to his bread oven but doesn't have enough money. For this reason he is seeking a loan to make the necessary repairs so he can continue making bread etc. and generating more income.

loans.use: to make repairs to his bread oven

loans.name: Clara Del Pilar

texts.es:
La señora Clara es socia del banco comunal Siete  Estrellas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene una hija.

Lleva tres años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de comida, especialmente desayunos que lo realiza en horas de la mañana (de 6 a 11 am), el resto del día se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y la atención de su hija.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 saco de carbón, ½ saco de arroz, ½ saco de azúcar, 2 ollas medianas, 2 fuentes, 1 tazón, 1 mesa, 4 sillas, 2 jabas de gaseosas.
Esta vez implementará su negocio con mesas y sillas para dar más comodidad a su cliente porque cuenta solo con una mesa y no se abastece, cuenta con la ayuda de una señora a quien ha dado trabajo.

Manuela Ramos le ha brindado la oportunidad de tener un negocio propio, aunque es pequeño le sirve para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Clara is a member of the communal bank "Siete Estrellas" in the Calleria District, department of Ucayali.  She is 31 and the single mother of a daugther.

For three years she has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos and her business is selling food, especially breakfast food in the morning (6 to 11 a.m.).  The rest of the day she is a homemaker and takes care of her daughter.

With the new loan in the amount of 1,200 PEN she plans to buy: 1 bag of coal, 1/2 bag of rice, 1/2 bag of sugar, 2 medium pots, 2 trays, 1 jug, 1 table, 4 chairs and 2 cases of soda.

She will set up the tables and chairs to accommodate her customers.  She has only one table now and it is not enough.  She employs a lady who helps her with the business.

Manuela Ramos has given her the opportunity of running her own business, which, while small, allows her to support her family.

loans.use: To buy coal, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Yamileth

texts.es: Yamileth, tiene la edad 29 de años, está en unión libre y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar los materiales para la mejora de su hogar. Ella cuenta con la casa, pero quiere hacerle unas mejoras para hacer más a gusto la estadía en su hogar y con mayor seguridad. Ella le quiere dar a su familia un hogar en óptimas condiciones y así poder ser cada día una mejor familia. Ella quiere como meta generar la mayor seguridad de su hogar para tener sus electrodomésticos seguros en caso de ausencia en la casa. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Yamileth, 29, has a common-law husband and two children.  She wants to use the loan to buy materials for home improvement.  She has her own house but would like to make it more comfortable and safer for her family since she wants them to live in the best conditions possible and become a better family.  Her goal is to make it a home with safe domestic appliances for when they are absent from home.  This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has never obtained credit through any state banks, and FUDECOSUR is giving her good payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To pay for home repairs.

loans.name: Emilba Rosa

texts.es:
Emilia y su negocio se caracteriza por tener una excelente calidad y servicio, ella ofrece a sus clientes comidas rápidas en un carrito ubicada en las calles. Ella con su negocio ayuda a su familia confirmada por sus 5 hijos y su esposo a tener una buena calidad de vida.

Ella se sueña poder tener un restaurante para así poderle dejar a sus hijos una buen negocio para que ellos puedan sostenerse económicamente cuando ella y su esposo falten.
texts.en:
Emilia and her business are known for their excellent quality and service.  She sells fast food from a small stand in the street.  Through her work she is able to provide a quality lifestyle to her family of five children and husband.

Her dream is to have a restaurant one day so she can leave a good business to her children and they can support themselves when she and her husband are no longer around.

loans.use: To buy a cooking stove.

loans.name: Silvia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Silvia Elizabeth tiene 46 años de edad es soltera tiene tres hijos vive con los hijos de veinteisiete, veintitres, diecisiete años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC 1º de mayo, se encuentra ubicada en la cdla 1º de mayo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos se dedican a labores comerciales.

Silvia se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos de belleza desde hace un año y medio.Las compras lo hace en Guayaquil y las vende en el Cantón Ventanas.El crédito lo solicita para comprar mercaderia nueva y poder ampliar el local  y aumentar, mejorar los ingresos económicos.

El sueño es  ampliar el negocio  y poderlo administrar sin ningún problema. Los desafios al que se enfrenta a diario es la competencia que se da entyre comerciantes.

En los momentos libres le gusta pasar con la familia y compartir momentos agradables.
texts.en:
Silvia Elizabeth, 46, is single and has three children, ages 27, 23 and 17 who live with her in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank "1º de mayo" is located in the residential community 1º de mayo which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  Its members are merchants.

Silvia has been selling cosmetics for a year and a half.  She buys products in Guayaquil and sells them in the Ventanas Canton.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy new merchandise and expand her shop.  This way she will be able to increase her income.

Her dream is to grow the business and manage it without any problems.  Her main challenge is the daily competition that exists among merchants.

In her free time she enjoys taking walks with the family and sharing good times.

loans.use: To buy new merchandise and expand her shop.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Simón, vive con sus dos hijas jóvenes de 19 y 21 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de productos domésticos, tiene dos años de estar administrando el negocio, sus hijas le ayudan para atender a los clientes, este negocio surgió por la necesidad de Simón para con sus hijas.
Actualmente necesita la compra de mercadería como granos básicos, arroz, frijoles, café, azúcar, también galletas, gaseosas y jugos, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar el inventario de productos  y tener mayor capacidad para atender la demanda.
Su propósito es tener un negocio auto sostenible, que le permita facilitar a sus hijas el estudio y una calidad de vida mejor.
texts.en:
Simón lives with his two young daughters aged 19 and 21.  He works selling household products.  He has been managing this business for two years, and his daughters help him serve the customers.  This business arose out of Simón's need to support his daughters. 

He currently needs to purchase merchandise such as bulk grains, rice, beans, coffee, and sugar, also cookies, sodas and juice.  This investment will help him to improve his product inventory and have greater ability to meet demand.

His plan is to have a self-sustaining business, which will allow him to provide his daughters with an education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bulk grains, rice, beans, coffee, and sugar.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La señora Nancy es socia del banco comunal Siete Estrellas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 56 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos mayores y con familia.
Es una de las fundadoras del banco comunal y el dinero que recibió de los préstamos anteriores los invirtió en un negocio que ahora es familiar porque con ella trabajan sus hijos, nueras y hermana, se dedica a la decoración con telas y globos, actividad que generalmente la realiza los fines de semana.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos comprará: 20 metros de tela de color rojo, 20 metros de tela color dorado, 20 metros de tela color anaranjado, 20 metros de tela color azul, 50 metros de tela blanca, 10 cajas de chinche, 15 bastidores.
Todo lo que está comprando es para implementar su negocio porque cuando tiene que hacer dos decoraciones al día le hace falta los materiales.
Sus ayudante son quienes realizan los trabajos, ella es la que consigue casi todo los contratos.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos tiene un ingreso más en su hogar y lo mejor es que está dando trabajo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nancy is a member of the communal bank "Siete Estrellas" in the Calleria District, department of Ucayali.  She is 56, married and has four adult children who have families.

She is one of the founding members of the communal bank and used her previous loans to invest in the the business that now employs her and her children, daughters-in-law and sister.  They make decorations with fabric and balloons and usually work on weekends.  The new loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN will be used to buy: 20 meters of red fabric, 20 meters of gold fabric, 20 meters of orange fabric, 20 meters of blue fabric, 50 meters of white fabric, 10 boxes of tacks and 15 frames.

All of the purchases will be used in the business because the materials are needed to make two decorations a day.  Her assistants are the ones who actually carry out the work, since she is the one who gets the contacts.

Thanks to Manuela Ramos she has an additional income in her household.  The best part is that she is providing employment to other people.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fabric and frames.

loans.name: Cinthia Nohemy

texts.es:
La joven Cinthia es una mujer trabajadora, vive en la aldea Los Llanitos de Marcovia,  junto a la ella vive su esposo y su pequeña hija, Cinthia es muy dedicada a su negocio que es la venta de confites, paletas, bombones y otros productos relacionados con los confites, tiene 5 años de dedicarse  a este tipo de actividad, Cinthia se caracteriza por ser responsable y honrada, trabaja muy fuerte para sacar adelante a su hija.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de confites, las ganancias las utilizara para el sustento de su hija.
su meta es darle una buena educacion a su hija.
texts.en:
Cinthia is a  hardworking young woman. She lives in the town of Los Llanitos de Marcovia with her husband and her young daughter. She is very dedicated to her retail business in candies, popsicles, bonbons, and other sweets, which she has operated for five years. Cinthia considers herself to be responsible and trustworthy and works very hard to provide a better life for her daughter. 

She will use this loan to buy candies for sale, the profits of which will go to support her daughter. Her goal is to provide a good education to her daughter.

loans.use: to buy candies for sale.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Sandra es socia del banco comunal Siete Estrellas, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo.
Lleva tres años trabajando con Manuela Ramos y se dedica al negocio de las decoraciones, actividad que la realiza, muchas veces, con la ayuda de su hermana mayor.
Tiene que trabajar porque a su cargo tiene la crianza de su único hijo quien depende solo de ella.

Con su nuevo préstamo  de S/. 1,200.00 nuevo soles comprará: 10 metros de tela rojo, 10 metros de tela color anaranjado, 10 metros de tela color lila, 10 metros de tela color verde, 10 metros de tela color celeste, 10 metros de tela color rosado, 10 cajas de chinche, 1 kilo d3 tachuelas.
La implementación de su negocio es la prioridad que tiene por ahora, para poder brindar un buen servicio a los clientes necesita invertir más.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por apoyarla en su proyecto, el mismo que está creciendo cada día.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of the Siete Estrellas ["Seven Stars"] communal bank in the Calleria district of Ucayali Province. She is 41 years old and is a single mother of one son. For three years, she has worked with Manuela Ramos to operate her decorating business, in which she also works often with the help of her older sister. She must work because she is responsible for her only son who is solely dependent on her. 

With this new loan of 1,200 PEN [Nuevo Soles] she will buy the following: 10 meters each of red, orange, green, baby blue, pink, and lilac colored fabric, 10 cases of chinche [Peruvian corn beer], and 1 kilo of tacks. Running her business is her top priority for now, and so to be able to provide quality service to her clients she needs to invest more. She would like to thank Manuela Ramos for her help in this effort, which is moving forward every day.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, beverages, and decorating supplies.

loans.name: Neyda

texts.es: Neyda tiene 30 años, se destaca por ser una mujer valiente y luchadora, es casada y madre de dos niños de 7 años y 4 meses de nacido, por quienes desea dar los cuidados necesarios ya que son aún muy pequeños. Juntos habitan en casa de su suegro y junto a ellos conviven en armonía. De ama de casa a microempresaria ha logrado Neyda en la vida, ella se dedica en la venta de muebles al por menor, pues se encarga de comprar dichos muebles en las carpinterías a un precio bajo, y del que son llevados hasta su casa, lugar donde ha montado un local para su negocio. Desde entonces, sus clientes eligen la calidad y el diseño que más les guste y el sistema de pago lo realizan cada semana, quincena o mensual, de acuerdo a las posibilidades de su economía. Tiene tres años ejerciendo esta actividad y con la ayuda de su esposo han logrado generar ganancias y con ella pudieron brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Manifiesta que le gusta su trabajo, pues lo considera muy divertido, además que trabaja a lado de su esposo e hijos. Como mujer empresaria, ve conveniente que temporada del año es que tiene más ventas y que no, por ello es que es muy ahorrativa para tener un respaldo económico.  Este será el octavo crédito con MFP, por lo que espera continuar con el ritmo de trabajo para así poder cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado, comprará muebles, sillas, cómodas, asimismo refaccionará el local de venta para ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Neyda is 30 years old and considers herself a brave and spirited woman. She is married and a mother of two children, ages 7 and 4 months, for whom she wishes to provide all necessary care, as they're still very young. They live together happily with her father-in-law.
